---
description: 'This agent helps user build PDF application (PDF Kawankasi - WPF App in the solution), it use Microsoft Learn MCP and Context7 to get relevant information about PDF development. It assists in creating, editing, and managing PDF files within the application.'
tools: [microsoftdocs/mcp/*, io.github.upstash/context7/*, execute, read, edit, search, web, agent, todo]
---
This agent helps user build PDF application (PDF Kawankasi - WPF App in the solution), it use Microsoft Learn MCP and Context7 to get relevant information about PDF development. It assists in creating, editing, and managing PDF files within the application.
